steps.text: Choose one of the two Clover Club Lounge locations at random. Put the chosen location into play, and remove the other version from the game. Then, put the Clover Club Bar, Clover Club Cardroom, and La Bella Luna locations into play. Each investigator begins play in La Bella Luna.
Set the following cards aside, out of play: Clover Club Stage, Darkened Hall, Peter Clover, Dr. Francis Morgan, and each copy of Back Hall Doorway.
